name: Brunello di Montalcino Poggio All'Oro
description: Estate-bottled in limited quantities only in exceptional years from our finest
food_pairing: Superb accompaniment to red meats, game and aged cheeses.

name: Sangioveto Toscana
description: Dark ruby colour with shades of purple. Very intense nose with bouquet of balsamic, flowery violet, iris, spices, red fruits, vanilla and cloves.
food_pairing: Ribollita (Tuscan bread, bean, and vegetable soup), pheasant, wild game, and stews. Aged cheeses and chocolate

name: Stina Plavac Mali Majstor
description: Intense, clean and attractive aromas are representing the best of the varietyâ€™s qualities. The fruitiness of plums is mixed with mineral tones reminiscent of seaweed, herbal notes of Mediterranean plants.
food_pairing: Hearty soups, hearty meat stews, pork tenderloin, steaks, cheeses.
